template.p: Welcome to your new Odoo Hair Salon package!

This guide will help you navigate the key features and get your salon business up and running efficiently. From managing appointments, selling services and products, managing your inventory, to building your online presence, this package has everything you need to streamline your operations and delight your clients.

template.p: Use the Appointment app to allow clients to book hair services easily:

ul.li: Set up appointment types (e.g., "Women's Haircut", "Hair Coloring")
Define your stylists' availability
Let clients book directly through your booking page
Manage your staff's booking directly the Appointment App.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: If you want to completely avoid no-shows, you can set a pre-payment for online booking, by linking each appointment type with a specific product and defining a payment method.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-success pb-0 pt-3

div.p: If you want to optimize your planning, you can also set breaks in appointment.
This will split an appointment to free the planning during the break. This way, you can start a Coloring, take another client, and return to your first client right after.

template.p: Create and manage your salon services and products:

ul.li: Set up services like "Women's Haircut" or "Hair Coloring"
Manage inventory for hair care products and replenish with the Purchase App.
Define pricing for each service and product.

template.p: Handle walk-ins and product sales efficiently:

ul.li: Process quick transactions for services and products
Manage cash and card payments
Track daily sales and reconcile at closing
Create loyalty programs and gift cards.

template.p: Showcase your salon and enable online bookings:

ul.li: Create an attractive website to display your services
Allow clients to book appointments online
Showcase your stylists and their specialties

ul.li: Set Up Your Services: Navigate to Sales > Products and set up your hair salon services and products.
Configure Appointment Types: In the Appointment app, create types that match your services.
Design Your Website: Use the Website app to create an attractive online presence for your salon.
Set Up Your Point of Sale: Configure your POS system for efficient in-salon transactions.
Manage Your Inventory: Input your hair care products and stock levels in the Inventory app.
Start Booking Appointments: Begin using the Appointment app to schedule client services.

div.p: Configure loyalty programs or promotions within your Point of Sale.
Encourage clients to book through your online Appointment page to reduce your efforts.
Set up Reminders on appointments to reduce no-show rate.
Use the POS system to upsell hair care products during checkout.
Monitor your inventory levels closely to ensure you have popular products in stock.
